scripts.pack:win64: electron-packager . Scummy  --ignore=release-builds --ignore=build_assets --ignore=_original_box_art --overwrite --version-string.LegalCopyright='Created by Justin harrelson' --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --icon=build_assets/icons/scummy.ico --prune=true --out=release-builds --version-string.CompanyName='Justin Harrelson' --version-string.FileDescription=CE --version-string.ProductName='Scummy'
scripts.pack:win32: electron-packager . Scummy  --ignore=release-builds --ignore=build_assets --ignore=_original_box_art --overwrite --version-string.LegalCopyright='Created by Justin harrelson' --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --icon=build_assets/icons/scummy.ico --prune=true --out=release-builds --version-string.CompanyName='Justin Harrelson' --version-string.FileDescription=CE --version-string.ProductName='Scummy'
scripts.pack:maci64: electron-packager . Scummy  --ignore=release-builds --ignore=build_assets --ignore=_original_box_art --overwrite --version-string.LegalCopyright='Created by Justin harrelson' --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --icon=build_assets/icons/scummy.icns --prune=true --out=release-builds --version-string.CompanyName='Justin Harrelson' --version-string.FileDescription=CE --version-string.ProductName='Scummy'
scripts.pack:macm1: electron-packager . Scummy  --ignore=release-builds --ignore=build_assets --ignore=_original_box_art --overwrite --version-string.LegalCopyright='Created by Justin harrelson' --platform=darwin --arch=arm64 --icon=build_assets/icons/scummy.icns --prune=true --out=release-builds --version-string.CompanyName='Justin Harrelson' --version-string.FileDescription=CE --version-string.ProductName='Scummy'
scripts.build: npm run pack:win64 && npm run pack:win32 && npm run pack:maci64 && npm run pack:macm1
